revision.text: {{Wireless embedded system |brand=technicolor |model=C1100T |revision=(CenturyLink) |fcc_date=09/29/2015 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Foxconn |type=wireless router,dsl modem,analog phone gateway |fcc_id=RSE-C1100T |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM63168U;BCM63168UKFEBG |cpu1_cspeed=400 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model=MT29F1G08ABAEA |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B1G1646G-BCK0 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM63168U;BCM63168UKFEBG; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=PCB on-board |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM53124S;BCM53124SKMMLG; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1G |wan_ports=1 |flags=VDSL, ADSL2+, VoIP, |stock_os=Linux;;2.6.30; |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=CenturyLinkXXXX, |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin }} {{TagLine|VDSL/ADSL2+ Wireless Router/VoIP Gateway}} {{see also|technicolor TG788vn v2}} ===Telnet Access=== Telnet to 192.168.0.1; login with admin and given password; :enter sh to enter a basic busybox command shell.
